validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.titleMin: Title must be at least 3 characters
validation.titleMax: Title must be at most 100 characters
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters
validation.descriptionMax: Description must be at most 2000 characters
validation.locationMin: Location must be at least 3 characters
validation.capacityPositive: Capacity must be a positive number
validation.dateInFuture: Date must be in the future

errors.networkError: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
errors.serverError: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.eventNotFound: The event you are looking for does not exist.
errors.eventFull: This event has reached maximum capacity.
errors.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered for this event.
